title: What are the advantages and disadvantages of information globalization? - Quora

response.answer_text: What are the advantages and disadvantages of information globalization? Advantages - just wonderful, Civilization will grow. Disadvantages - Too many Super Greedy people will kill most of the peoples growth and hence the Civilization at much faster rate than in the past. Some examples - Venezuela… $32 Trillion in Offshore accounts…not to mention domestic accounts… UBS is one of the world’s largest private banks, with $653 billion in assets under management as of March 2016.
